movie.title: A Sniper's War
movie.description_intro: A story of a sniper fighting for the pro-Russian rebels in Eastern Ukraine.
movie.description_full: A story of a sniper fighting for the pro-Russian rebels in Eastern Ukraine.

movies.title: A Thousand Cuts
movies.summary: A look at how Philippine President Rodrigo Duterte uses social media to spread disinformation.
movies.description_full: A look at how Philippine President Rodrigo Duterte uses social media to spread disinformation.
movies.synopsis: A look at how Philippine President Rodrigo Duterte uses social media to spread disinformation.

movies.title: The Kingmaker
movies.summary: An extraordinary look into the controversial political career of Imelda Marcos. As the former first lady of the Philippines, Imelda Marcos is best known for her opulent lifestyle, but it was her behind-the-scenes influence of her husband's presidency that rocketed her to the global political forefront. A journey through the Marcos family's long history of corruption, extravagance and brutality, this documentary tells a cautionary tale of a powerful female leader whose questionable sense of reality divided a nation.

movies.title: Billy Connolly: High Horse Tour Live
movies.title_english: Billy Connolly: High Horse Tour Live
movies.title_long: Billy Connolly: High Horse Tour Live (2016)
movies.summary: The legend returns in his 'High Horse Tour'. Even at the age of 72, the legendary Scot has a wild, manic energy, and is still as sharp as ever.
movies.description_full: The legend returns in his 'High Horse Tour'. Even at the age of 72, the legendary Scot has a wild, manic energy, and is still as sharp as ever.

movies.title: The Beatles: Eight Days a Week - The Touring Years
movies.title_english: The Beatles: Eight Days a Week - The Touring Years
movies.title_long: The Beatles: Eight Days a Week - The Touring Years (2016)
movies.summary: In the 1960s, the Beatles exploded on to the public scene, seemingly out of nowhere as the band's formative years of constant performing at home and in Hamburg, and Brian Epstein's grooming, finally paid off beyond their wildest dreams. Accompanying new interviews of the remaining Beatles, their associates and fans as well as archival interviews of the late ones, this film features footage of the heady concert years of 1963 to 66 when the band became a worldwide cultural phenomena topping them all. Furthermore, it also follows how the Fab Four began to change and grow while the excitement of Beatlemania began to sour their lives into an intolerable slog they needed to escape from to become more than what their fans wanted.
